message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm confident you'll find it to be a game-changer. I'm willing to start with an offer of $2000000 for the product. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I'm interested in the product, but I have a limited budget. Can we meet in the middle at $1350000?

Bob, I understand you have a limited budget, but I'm not sure I can meet you at $1350000. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1400000. What do you think?
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $1300000. Can we meet at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a decent profit. How about we meet at $1320000? That's a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to work with you.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far from my target. I'm willing to go up to $1280000, but that's as high as I can go. Can we meet at this price?

Bob, I understand you've reached your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1280000. I'm willing to meet you at $1290000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm hoping we can meet in the middle at this price.
I've reached my maximum budget, and I'm not willing to go any higher. I'm making a final offer of $1280000. This is my absolute limit. I hope you can meet me at this price.

Bob, I understand you've reached your maximum budget, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $1280000. I'm willing to meet you at $1290000, but I'm not going any lower. I'm starting to think it's time to explore other options. Can you reconsider?
